alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Miami; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 7:55PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN SHELBY, NORTHWESTERN CHAMPAIGN AND EASTERN MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM EDT... At 755 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near West Milton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Troy, Sidney, Piqua, Tipp City, St. Paris, Christiansburg, Fletcher, Port Jefferson, Casstown, Rosewood, Carysville, Ballou, Plattsville, Springhills, Kiser Lake State Park, Millerstown, Farrington, Pemberton and Grayson. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 70 and 92, and near mile marker 95. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
